trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Casper
There were no other sightings in Casper on or around May 6th 2012
Summary: Saw beautiful, bright, colorful, pulsating oblong-shaped 'star' hovering in the sky, towards the south.
divs: sighting detailslooked out window towards bright full moon...noticed 'star'...pulsating w\red, then white, orange-ish lights on it...remained somewhat in the same spot. pulsated\radiated colorful....got teenage son to check it out, we looked w\binoculars & noticed the same...must've been in the sky for about 15 minutes....1st time noticing something that i thought was a star, but convinced it was definitely not an airplane or a star...pretty unsure at this point.
